‚ÄúBetaab Dil‚Äù is a heart-touching romantic Hindi song that brings back the golden era of 90s Bollywood music. Sung and composed by Sarit Dutta, this soulful melody beautifully captures the emotions of love, longing, and separation. The heartfelt lyrics by Dr. Uma Naveen Mehta paint a timeless picture of a betaab (restless) heart waiting for its beloved.

If you miss the charm of classic love songs, ‚ÄúBetaab Dil‚Äù will take you straight back to that nostalgic era of melody and emotion.
